page.title: 11CLUBS - AUCHINLECK
page.content: Auchinleck has several clubs and organisations which cater for both children and adults. The children can join groups like the Brownies, Girl Guides,Scouts,Cubs and Boys Brigade. There are also the Youth clubs and the C.B. Club (Citizen- Band Radios) Bowling is a very popular sport in the village and the Indoor and Outdoor Bowling Clubs have a large membership. Racing pigeon enthusiasts also run a thriving club and enter races from all parts of Britain and occasionally the continent. The Working Mens Club provides entertainment and drinking facilities.
